text: The American Broadcast Company (ABC) is an American television network. Along with CBS, NBC and Fox, it is one of the country's four major television networks. The network is owned by The Walt Disney Company following the acquisition of the Capital Cities/ABC by the company in 1995. ==ABC Television Shows== * The Goldbergs * The Rookie * American Idol * Dancing with the Stars * The Bachelor * Grey's Anatomy * The Good Doctor * Big Sky ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * ABC at the Museum of Broadcast Communications Encyclopedia of Television * Category:1943 establishments in the United States Category:American Broadcasting Company Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Disney companies
title: American Broadcasting Company
